text:
@neal_katyal I say let them end The Affordable  Care Act or Obamacare. They have NO replacement. #COVID19 killing over 120,000 Americans will be nothing compared to what having No Healthcare system will do
#WeWantJoe #MorningJoe #FridayFeeling #FridayMotivation
